---
title: Greek Yogurt Protein Smoothie
description: High protein smoothie.
categories: [Protein, Snack]
cooktime: 2 minutes
---

* 2 scoops protein powder
* 1/2 cup greek yogurt
* 1 banana
* 1/3 cup berries
* 1/2 tbsp flaxseed
* 1/3 tbsp chia seed
* 1 tbsp honey
* Add water for desired consistency

Blend until smooth.
